description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Tabanan, Indonesia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Bali Five-Star Boutique Sustainable Jungle Villas Amid Rice Paddies
hotels.description: Find your slice of jungle paradise at Nirjhara, a serene five-star sanctuary set in the timeless landscape of Tabanan. Bali opulence is taken to new heights at this sustainable enclave, with each intimate suite and villa surrounded by verdant rice fields and lush tropical foliage, and offering luxe touches like rooftop baths or private infinity pools. Recycled wood, natural stone and traditional sirap roofing combine to create authentic decor that preserves the natural landscape. If you can bear to leave your private kingdom, myriad deluxe facilities await: dive into the glistening pool, relax by the property's waterfall or sink into serenity at the tranquil day spa. Exceptional cuisine is within easy reach at onsite restaurant Ambu, and it's an easy stroll to spectacular Balinese sunsets from Kendungu Beach.

hotels.title: Serene Bali Beachfront Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Just steps from the black sands of Nyanyi Beach, this opulent resort is part of the Nuanu Creative City complex, home to Bali's hottest new beach club, Luna, as well as The Labyrinth Collective artists' retreat and a wealth of dining and wellness sanctuaries. Each suite here prioritises wellness and relaxation above all else. Spoil yourself with craft drinks and locally sourced, globally inspired fare at Akoya Restaurant and Akoya Bar - choose from a careful curation of organic, free-range produce that celebrates European cuisine. Take a dip in the sparkling infinity pool or enjoy a delicious cocktail and gaze out at the ocean.

hotels.title: Celebrity-Favourite Oceanfront Bali Hideaway with Two World-Class Restaurants & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: The southwest coast of Bali is home to the five-star Soori Bali, an oceanfront and sustainably driven resort designed by award-winning architecture firm SCDA. Favoured by celebrities, this opulent retreat is dedicated to providing an A-list experience. The two restaurants use fresh produce from nearby farms and spices from their own garden to craft exquisite meals. If you're craving premium Western cuisine, secure a table at Ombak, while the open-air Cotta serves authentic Indonesian cuisine. The palm-fringed infinity pool blends into the horizon, offering a pleasant space to forget the world, while Soori Spa and its menu of pampering treatments offer a transcendental experience.

seo.title: Hoteles en Tabanan - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Tabanan, Indonesia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
